snippet.title: Little Orpheus Console Announcement | Wishlist Now!
snippet.description:
Ivan's adventures are headed for a much wider audience..
Wishlist now! 🚀

🎡 Nintendo Switch - https://bit.ly/3H0709f
🦖 Play Station EU - https://bit.ly/3FYBIyw
🐟 Play Station US - https://bit.ly/3KAEjC6
🐶 Steam - https://bit.ly/3IvDNn4
🪁 Xbox - https://bit.ly/3nYYtMt

Visit the game's official website:
https://www.littleorpheus.com/


From the creators of Dear Esther, Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs and Everybody's Gone to the Rapture

Follow The Chinese Room on social media:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thechineseroombrighton
Twitter - https://twitter.com/ChineseRoom
